00208 
00209 #define BLOCKSIZE 16
00210 
00211 /****************************** Variables ***************************/
00212 static unsigned char _roundCounter;
00213 static unsigned char _rcon;
00214 
00215 /****************************** Macros ******************************/
00216 #define xtime(a) (((a)<0x80)?(a)<<1:(((a)<<1)^0x1b) )
00217 /* if(a<0x80){a<<=1;}else{a=(a<<1)^0x1b;}
00218 
00219 /****************************** Function Prototypes *****************/
00220 void EncodeShiftRow(unsigned char* block);
00221 void DecodeShiftRow(unsigned char* stateTable);
00222 void EncKeySchedule(unsigned char* key);
00223 void DecKeySchedule(unsigned char* key);
00224 
00225 /****************************** Functions ***************************/
00226 
00227 /*********************************************************************
00228  * Function:        void AESEncode(unsigned char* block, unsigned char* key)
00229  *
00230  * PreCondition:    None
00231  *
00232  * Input:           block - 16 byte block of data to be encrypted 
00233  *                                                  (padded if needed)
00234  *
00235  * Output:          None
00236  *
00237  * Side Effects:    block values changed
00238  *
00239  * Stack Requirements: None
00240  *
00241  * Overview:        None
00242  *
00243  * Note:            None
00244  ********************************************************************/
00245 
00246 #ifdef ENCODE
00247 void AESEncode(unsigned char* block, unsigned char* key)
00248 {
00249         unsigned char i;
00250         unsigned char temp;
00251 
00252         /* initiate round counter = 10 */
00253         _roundCounter = 10;
00254 
00255         _rcon = 0x01;
00256 
00257         /* key addition */
00258         for(i=0;i<BLOCKSIZE;i++)
00259         {
00260                 block[i] ^= key[i];     
00261         }
00262 
00263         do
00264         {
00265 
00266                 /* s table substitution */
00267                 for(i=0;i<BLOCKSIZE;i++)
00268                 {
00269                         block[i]=STable[block[i]];
00270                 }
00271 
00272                 /*   encode shift row */
00273                 EncodeShiftRow(block);
00274 
00275                 /*   if round counter != 1 */
00276                 if(_roundCounter != 1)
00277                 {
00278                         unsigned char aux,aux1,aux2,aux3;
00279                         /*     mix column */
00280                         for(i=0;i<16;i+=4)
00281                         {
00282                                 aux1= block[i+0] ^ block[i+1];
00283                                 aux3= block[i+2]^block[i+3];
00284                                 aux = aux1 ^ aux3;
00285                                 aux2= block[i+2]^block[i+1];
00286 
00287                                 aux1 = xtime(aux1);
00288                                 aux2 = xtime(aux2);
00289                                 aux3 = xtime(aux3);
00290 
00291                                 block[i+0]= aux^aux1^block[i+0];
00292                                 block[i+1]= aux^aux2^block[i+1];
00293                                 block[i+2]= aux^aux3^block[i+2];
00294                                 block[i+3]= block[i+0]^block[i+1]^block[i+2]^aux;
00295                         }
00296                 }
00297                 /*   encode key schedule */ 
00298                 EncKeySchedule(key);
00299 
00300                 /*   key addition */
00301                 for(i=0;i<BLOCKSIZE;i++)
00302                 {
00303                         block[i] ^= key[i];
00304                 }
00305                 
00306                 _roundCounter--;
00307         }
00308         while(_roundCounter !=0);
00309 }
00310 #endif

00312 /*********************************************************************
00313 * Function: void EncKeySchedule(unsigned char* key)
00314 *
00315 * PreCondition:
00316 *
00317 * Input: key - array of the key data
00318 *
00319 * Output: 
00320 *
00321 * Side Effects: values of the key changed
00322 *
00323 * Overview: None
00324 *
00325 * Note: None
00326 ********************************************************************/
00327 #ifdef ENCODE
00328 #define ENC_KEY_NEEDED
00329 #endif
00330 #ifdef DECODE
00331 #ifdef calcKey
00332 #define ENC_KEY_NEEDED
00333 #endif
00334 #endif
00335 #ifdef ENC_KEY_NEEDED
00336 void EncKeySchedule(unsigned char* key)
00337 {
00338         /* column 1 */
00339         key[0]^=STable[key[13]];
00340         key[1]^=STable[key[14]];
00341         key[2]^=STable[key[15]];
00342         key[3]^=STable[key[12]];
00343 
00344         key[0]^=_rcon;
00345         _rcon = xtime(_rcon);
00346 
00347         /* column 2 */
00348         key[4]^=key[0];
00349         key[5]^=key[1];
00350         key[6]^=key[2];
00351         key[7]^=key[3];
00352 
00353         /* column 3 */
00354         key[8]^=key[4];
00355         key[9]^=key[5];
00356         key[10]^=key[6];
00357         key[11]^=key[7];
00358 
00359         /* column 4 */
00360         key[12]^=key[8];
00361         key[13]^=key[9];
00362         key[14]^=key[10];
00363         key[15]^=key[11];
00364 }
00365 #endif

00368 /*********************************************************************
00369 * Function: void EncodeShiftRow(unsigned char* stateTable)
00370 *
00371 * PreCondition:
00372 *
00373 * Input: stateTable - the data needing to be shifted
00374 *
00375 * Output: 
00376 *
00377 * Side Effects: values of the inputed data changed
00378 *
00379 * Overview: None
00380 *
00381 * Note: None
00382 ********************************************************************/
00383 #ifdef ENCODE
00384 void EncodeShiftRow(unsigned char* stateTable)
00385 {
00386         unsigned char temp;
00387 
00388         /* first row (row 0) unchanged */
00389 
00390         /* second row (row 1) shifted left by one */
00391         temp=stateTable[1];
00392         stateTable[1]=stateTable[5];
00393         stateTable[5]=stateTable[9];
00394         stateTable[9]=stateTable[13];
00395         stateTable[13]=temp;
00396         
00397         /* third row (row 2) shifted left by two */
00398         temp=stateTable[2];
00399         stateTable[2]=stateTable[10];
00400         stateTable[10]=temp;
00401         temp=stateTable[14];
00402         stateTable[14]=stateTable[6];
00403         stateTable[6]=temp;
00404 
00405         /* fourth row (row 3) shifted left by three (or right by one) */
00406         temp=stateTable[3];
00407         stateTable[3]=stateTable[15];
00408         stateTable[15]=stateTable[11];
00409         stateTable[11]=stateTable[7];
00410         stateTable[7]=temp;
00411 }
00412 #endif

00414 /*********************************************************************
00415  * Function:        void AESCalcDecodeKey(unsigned char* key)
00416  *
00417  * PreCondition:    None
00418  *
00419  * Input:           key - array of the values of the 128 bit key
00420  *
00421  * Output:          None
00422  *
00423  * Side Effects:    key goes from encoding key to decoding key
00424  *
00425  * Stack Requirements: None
00426  *
00427  * Overview:        None
00428  *
00429  * Note:            None
00430  ********************************************************************/
00431 #ifdef calcKey
00432 void AESCalcDecodeKey(unsigned char* key)
00433 {
00434         _roundCounter = 10;
00435         
00436         _rcon=0x01;
00437         do
00438         {       
00439                 EncKeySchedule(key);
00440                 _roundCounter--;
00441         }
00442         while(_roundCounter>0);
00443 }
00444 #endif
00445 
00446 /*********************************************************************
00447  * Function:        void AESDecode(unsigned char* block, unsigned char* key)
00448  *
00449  * PreCondition:    None
00450  *
00451  * Input:           block - 16 byte block of data to be deciphered 
00452  *
00453  * Output:          None
00454  *
00455  * Side Effects:    block values changed
00456  *
00457  * Stack Requirements: None
00458  *
00459  * Overview:        None
00460  *
00461  * Note:            None
00462  ********************************************************************/
00463 #ifdef DECODE
00464 void AESDecode(unsigned char* block, unsigned char* key)
00465 {
00466         unsigned char i;
00467         unsigned char b[BLOCKSIZE];
00468 
00469         /* reconstruct key */
00470         i=1;
00471 
00472         _rcon = 0x36;
00473 
00474         /* initiate round counter = 10 */
00475         _roundCounter = 10;
00476 
00477         /* key addition */
00478         for(i=0;i<BLOCKSIZE;i++)
00479         {
00480                 block[i] ^= key[i];
00481         }
00482         Nop();
00483 
00484         do
00485         {
00486 
00487                 if( _roundCounter != 10)
00488                 {
00489                         /* inverse mix column */
00490                         /*     mix column */
00491 
00492                         {
00493                                 unsigned char temp0,temp1,temp2,temp3;
00494                                 for(i=0;i<16;i+=4)
00495                                 {
00496                                         temp3=x3[block[i+0x00]]^x3[block[i+0x01]]^x3[block[i+0x02]]^x3[block[i+0x03]]^block[i+0x00]^block[i+0x01]^block[i+0x02]^block[i+0x03];
00497                                         temp0=x2[block[i+0x00]]^x1[block[i+0x00]]
00498                                                           ^x1[block[i+0x01]]
00499                                                           ^x2[block[i+0x02]]
00500                                                           ^temp3^block[i+0x00];
00501                                         temp1=x2[block[i+0x01]]^x1[block[i+0x01]]
00502                                                           ^x1[block[i+0x02]]
00503                                                           ^x2[block[i+0x03]]
00504                                                           ^temp3^block[i+0x01];
00505                                         temp2=x2[block[i+0x02]]^x1[block[i+0x02]]
00506                                                           ^x1[block[i+0x03]]
00507                                                           ^x2[block[i+0x00]]
00508                                                           ^temp3^block[i+0x02];
00509                                         temp3^=x2[block[i+0x03]]^x1[block[i+0x03]]
00510                                                           ^x1[block[i+0x00]]
00511                                                           ^x2[block[i+0x01]]
00512                                                           ^block[i+0x03];
00513                                         block[i+0]=temp0;
00514                                         block[i+1]=temp1;
00515                                         block[i+2]=temp2;
00516                                         block[i+3]=temp3;
00517                                 }
00518                         }
00519                         
00520                 }
00521 
00522                 /* s table substitution */
00523                 for(i=0;i<BLOCKSIZE;i++)
00524                 {
00525                         block[i]=SiTable[block[i]];
00526                 }
00527 
00528                 /* decode shift row */
00529                 DecodeShiftRow(block);
00530 
00531                 /* decode key schedule */ 
00532                 DecKeySchedule(key);
00533 
00534                 for(i=0;i<BLOCKSIZE;i++)
00535                 {
00536                         block[i] ^= key[i];
00537                 }
00538 
00539                 _roundCounter--;
00540         }
00541         while( _roundCounter !=0);
00542 }
00543 
00544 /*********************************************************************
00545 * Function: void DecodeShiftRow(unsigned char* stateTable)
00546 *
00547 * PreCondition:
00548 *
00549 * Input: stateTable - array of data to be shifted
00550 *
00551 * Output: 
00552 *
00553 * Side Effects: values of the inputed data changed
00554 *
00555 * Overview: None
00556 *
00557 * Note: None
00558 ********************************************************************/
00559 void DecodeShiftRow(unsigned char* stateTable)
00560 {
00561         unsigned char temp;
00562 
00563         /* first row (row 0) unchanged */
00564 
00565         /* second row (row 1) shifted left by three (or right by one) */
00566         temp=stateTable[1];
00567         stateTable[1]=stateTable[13];
00568         stateTable[13]=stateTable[9];
00569         stateTable[9]=stateTable[5];
00570         stateTable[5]=temp;
00571         
00572         /* third row (row 2) shifted left by two */
00573         temp=stateTable[2];
00574         stateTable[2]=stateTable[10];
00575         stateTable[10]=temp;
00576         temp=stateTable[14];
00577         stateTable[14]=stateTable[6];
00578         stateTable[6]=temp;
00579 
00580         /* fourth row (row 3) shifted left by one */
00581         temp=stateTable[7];
00582         stateTable[7]=stateTable[11];
00583         stateTable[11]=stateTable[15];
00584         stateTable[15]=stateTable[3];
00585         stateTable[3]=temp;
00586 }
00587 
00588 /*********************************************************************
00589 * Function: void DecKeySchedule(unsigned char* key)
00590 *
00591 * PreCondition:
00592 *
00593 * Input: key - array of the key data
00594 *
00595 * Output: 
00596 *
00597 * Side Effects: values of the key changed to next key in decrypt
00598 *
00599 * Overview: None
00600 *
00601 * Note: None
00602 ********************************************************************/
00603 void DecKeySchedule(unsigned char* key)
00604 {
00605         /* column 4 */
00606         key[12]^=key[8];
00607         key[13]^=key[9];
00608         key[14]^=key[10];
00609         key[15]^=key[11];
00610         
00611         /* column 3 */
00612         key[8]^=key[4];
00613         key[9]^=key[5];
00614         key[10]^=key[6];
00615         key[11]^=key[7];
00616 
00617         /* column 2 */
00618         key[4]^=key[0];
00619         key[5]^=key[1];
00620         key[6]^=key[2];
00621         key[7]^=key[3];
00622 
00623         /* column 1 */
00624         key[0]^=STable[key[13]];
00625         key[1]^=STable[key[14]];
00626         key[2]^=STable[key[15]];
00627         key[3]^=STable[key[12]];
00628 
00629         key[0]^=_rcon;
00630         if(_rcon &0x01)
00631         {
00632                 _rcon = 0x80;
00633         }
00634         else
00635         {
00636                 _rcon >>= 1;
00637         }
00638 
00639 }
00640 #endif
